title: Certificate Telegram
description: Certificate content for Telegram account verification data.

activeDaysCount.description: The number of days the account has been active.

contactWithAtLeast10MessagesCount.description: The number of contacts with at least 10 messages.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the account was created. Must be less than the current time.

meanMonthlyMessageCount.description: The average number of messages sent per month.
